tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AirQualitySensorData (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date_time TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  temperature DECIMAL,
  humidity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE air_quality_sensors (
    sensor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    co_level FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE air_purifier_settings (
    setting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    air_purifier_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    fan_speed INTEGER,
    temperature_threshold FLOAT,
    humidity_threshold FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE AirQualitySensorData (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    air_quality_index INT
);

CREATE TABLE AirPurifierSystem (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    model VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    AI_enabled BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE SensorAlerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(20),
    alert_message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AirQualityLogs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
  air_quality DOUBLE,
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES SensorData(sensor_id)
);
